executeParallel(android.os.AsyncTask<Par.Description: Use @B_android#os#AsyncTask#executeOnExecutor_E@ directly. Executes the task with the specified parameters, allowing multiple tasks to run in parallel on a pool of threads managed by @B_android#os#AsyncTask_E@.
